channel.title: What client to use? - Please help me
channel.description:
So, I'm getting back into private servers, I used to do this a few years ago, but got bored. But I'm back to have a little fun and bring back some old memories.
So I'm getting this shit ready to go, and all I need is a good client to use. I used to use silab, but I guess that no longer exists? Moparscape lags me out whenever I click something, if I can even get in.
So whats the current low down on clients? Trying to get my head around all the new advancements since the last time I did this stuff. Help me out if you can, I would greatly appreciate it!
Thank you, DVC

item.title: What client to use? - Please help me
item.dc:creator: @wurz1l wurz1l
item.description:
@wurz1l wrote:

if you want

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

if not look in the downloads section until you find a better one, can’t really help cause i’ve only ever used silab client and moparscape client

Read full topic
